October 28, 2021
Goop
For 15pts more the set piece is definitely superior but this one is ok too. You have options of powers to use and that is more helpful than you might think. He's better than most in the starter but still a bit overcosted at 60pts. Spend 5pts to put Remaker ring on him for a 50/50 shape change and you got something here.
